title: Approach Vector
timeline: 2880.064 - Day 21 after initial discovery (3 days after Ch5)
location: Kepler-442 System ansible station, observation deck and Docking Bay 7

knows: Everything from Ch5, plus:
Meridian Runner carrying physical data from Sol Relay Station
Kaito requested her specifically by name
Ryn planning to intercept Kaito before they can meet
Darin reporting to Ryn about Lira's movements
Kaito's friend Yuki Tanaka died getting him the evidence
Earth made first contact 2840.184 - attempted communication
Aliens responded within 6 hours (FTL communication or already close)
Earth's ansible shut down 2840.187 (deliberate silence protocol)
Earth's radio continued 6 more days after ansible silence
Then complete blackout - all spectrum shutdown over 14 hours
Population evacuation/disappearance was organized, not attack
Thirty billion people disappeared without trace
Sensor logs show systematic grid shutdown, not violence
Could be hostile evacuation OR voluntary ascension/transcendence
No proof of threat hostility - just Earth's belief/interpretation
Ryn offering to show classified archives beyond Guild Master access
suspects: Earth may have transcended rather than been destroyed
Alien contact might have been beneficial, not hostile
Guild's justification may be based on fear not fact
Or Earth really was protecting colonies through sacrifice
Classified archives contain Earth's final unredacted message
does_not_know: What aliens said in their response to Earth's contact
Why Earth chose silence protocol if contact was positive
What's in the classified archives Ryn is offering to show
Whether thirty billion humans are dead or elsewhere
What Earth's final message to Guild Masters contained
Lira Voss.emotional_state: Determined. Moving into confrontation phase. Relief at finally meeting Kaito. Frustrated by continued ambiguity - evidence doesn't prove threat hostile. Prepared for consequences of investigation. Wary of Ryn's offer but willing to see full picture. Ready to make decision about exposure once she knows everything.
Lira Voss.location: Kepler-442 ansible station, moving toward classified archives with Ryn

knows: Everything Lira knows, plus:
He was in orbit during Earth's final days
Recorded complete sensor logs of shutdown sequence
Yuki Tanaka spent 2 years copying classified archives
She died before explaining what it all meant
Guild has been tracking his ship for 23 years
His evidence is insufficient to prove threat hostility
Lira has complementary evidence from ansible network
Together their data proves deception but not justification
suspects: Guild's fear may not be justified by facts
Ryn offering full disclosure because containment failed
does_not_know: Why organized evacuation if contact was hostile
What became of thirty billion humans
What's in classified archives beyond his clearance
Kaito Reeves.emotional_state: Carrying twenty-seven years of questions and grief. Relief at finally meeting someone who understands. Frustrated by ambiguity in his own evidence. Willing to see classified information before deciding. Survivor's guilt about leaving Earth. Hope that full truth will provide clarity.
Kaito Reeves.location: Kepler-442 ansible station, moving toward classified archives with Ryn

knows: Everything about Earth's silence and alien contact
Lira and Kaito have met and shared evidence
Their combined data proves deception but not justification
Containment has failed - truth is emerging
Only option now is controlled disclosure to Lira and Kaito
Classified archives contain information that might justify deception
Full truth might convince them not to expose everything
suspects: Full disclosure to Lira might prevent full disclosure to colonies
Showing classified archives is gamble that truth supports her position
If Lira knows everything, she might choose continued deception
does_not_know: If classified information will convince Lira
What Lira will decide after seeing everything
If exposure can still be prevented
Ryn Takada.emotional_state: Exhausted. Out of options. Making last gamble. Relief at potentially ending forty-year deception. Fear that full truth won't justify the lies. Hope that Lira will understand once she knows everything. Acceptance that her control over situation has ended.
Ryn Takada.location: Kepler-442 ansible station, leading Lira and Kaito to classified archives

revealed_to_reader: Meridian Runner arrives after 23-year journey from Sol System
Kaito requested Lira specifically - researched her background
Darin unknowingly reporting Lira's movements to Ryn
Yuki Tanaka (Kaito's friend) died getting him Sol Relay evidence
Earth made first contact 2840.184 with mathematical sequences
Aliens responded within 6 hours (impossibly fast for light-speed)
Earth initiated emergency protocols across all Guild Masters
Earth's ansible shut down 2840.187 morning (3 hours after message)
Earth's radio transmissions continued 6 more days
2840.193: Earth went dark in all spectrums over 14 hours
Not attack or bombardment - appeared voluntary/organized
Thirty billion people disappeared without trace
Evidence ambiguous - doesn't prove threat was hostile
Ryn offers to show classified archives beyond Guild Master access
Lira and Kaito agree to see full picture before deciding
Moving toward confrontation/revelation in deeper archives

planted.element: Classified archives beyond Guild Master access
planted.significance: The Magistrate's existence and deeper truth
What happened to thirty billion humans
They were already watching, already close

planted.element: Earth's radio continuing after ansible silence
Ambiguity of threat - hostile or beneficial unclear

planted.significance: Was it accident or Magistrate's assassination?

active_tensions: Meeting finally happening - Lira and Kaito sharing evidence
Combined data proves deception but not justification
Ambiguity: was Earth's evacuation hostile or voluntary?
No proof ansible is detectable beacon - just Earth's belief
Ryn offering full disclosure as last gamble
Will classified archives justify forty years of lies?
Lira must decide: expose incomplete truth or wait for full picture?
Guild security involved but not yet hostile arrest
world_changes: Lira and Kaito have met and exchanged evidence
Physical data from Sol Relay combined with ansible network analysis
Pattern of Earth's final days reconstructed from sensor logs
Moving toward classified archives beyond standard Guild Master access
Timeline shift: immediate confrontation rather than slow investigation
Security officers present but not yet arresting - unusual cooperation

meridian_runner: Cargo: Physical data archives from Sol Relay Station
first_contact_timeline: 2840.184.18:00 - Earth transmits mathematical sequences for first contact
2840.184.24:00 - Aliens respond (6 hours - FTL communication indicated)
2840.186.22:00 - Earth sends priority-alpha message to all Guild Masters
2840.187-193 - Earth's radio continues (6 days of preparation)
2840.193 - Complete shutdown over 14 hours, organized grid-by-grid
Result: Thirty billion people disappear without trace
sensor_logs: Kaito recorded from orbit during shutdown
Thermal imaging shows cities active then systematically dimming
No trace of population after shutdown - vanished completely
physical_evidence: Sol Relay data cores - pre-2840 technology, unhackable
Ansible metadata - classifications but not full content
Kaito's ship sensor logs - orbital observations
Together proves Earth made contact and disappeared
Does not prove hostile intent or ansible detection threat

themes_explored.evidence_and_interpretation: Same data supports multiple theories - hostile or beneficial
themes_explored.incomplete_truth: Knowing what happened doesn't explain why
themes_explored.trust_and_verification: Physical evidence proves events but not meaning
themes_explored.transcendence_vs_destruction: Did Earth ascend or get destroyed?

mood: Tension building to revelation. Finally meeting after 23 days/years of approach. Frustration with ambiguity. Moving toward deeper truth. Shift from investigation to confrontation.
pacing: Accelerating. Quick intercept. Evidence shared rapidly. Ryn's arrival shifts dynamic. Moving fast toward classified archives revelation.
chapter_purpose: Bridge to Chapter 7. Show Kaito's arrival and evidence. Establish ambiguity of threat. Set up classified archives revelation. Move from investigation to confrontation phase.

connections_to_story_graph.bridge_function: Connects preparation (Ch5) to physical evidence arrival (Ch7) by showing initial meeting and evidence exchange
connections_to_story_graph.causal_chain: Kaito arrives → shares Earth evacuation evidence → ambiguity about threat → Ryn offers classified archives → moving toward deeper revelation in Ch7
connections_to_story_graph.plot_acceleration: Shifts from slow investigation to immediate confrontation - pieces coming together rapidly
